name: Child Custody Agreement
description: Legal agreement for establishing child custody arrangements between parents

sections.title: 1. Parties
sections.content:
This Child Custody Agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into on {agreement_date} by and between:

{parent1_name}, residing at {parent1_address} ("Parent 1")

AND

{parent2_name}, residing at {parent2_address} ("Parent 2")

sections.title: 2. Children
3. Jurisdiction
sections.content: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of {jurisdiction_state}. The parties acknowledge that this state is the home state of the children and has jurisdiction over custody matters concerning the children.

sections.title: 4. Legal Custody
sections.content:
Legal custody refers to the right and responsibility to make decisions regarding the children's health, education, and welfare.

Legal Custody Arrangement: {legal_custody}

sections.title: 5. Physical Custody
sections.content:
Physical custody refers to where the children will primarily reside.

Physical Custody Arrangement: {physical_custody}

sections.title: 6. Parenting Time Schedule
8. Communication
sections.content: The parents shall communicate regarding the children as follows: {communication_method}

sections.title: 9. Decision Making
sections.content: Major decisions regarding the children shall be made as follows: {decision_making}

sections.title: 10. Child Support
sections.content: Child support shall be handled as follows: {child_support}

sections.title: 13. Relocation
sections.content: If either parent wishes to relocate, the following shall apply: {relocation_terms}

sections.title: 14. Modification
sections.content: This Agreement may be modified as follows: {modification_process}

sections.title: 16. Execution
sections.content:
By signing below, the parties acknowledge that they have read and understand this Agreement, that they enter into it freely and voluntarily, and that they intend to be legally bound by its terms.
